dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so we gotta talk about this Canelo Alvarez deal. I mean, it's just... massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so we gotta talk about this Canelo Alvarez deal. I mean, it's just... massive.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, dude, absolutely. When I saw the numbers, my jaw dropped. $365 million, like, over thirteen years?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, dude, absolutely. When I saw the numbers, my jaw dropped. three hundred sixty five million dollars, like, over thirteen years?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deal is worth a minimum of $365 million... The Alvarez deal tops the 13-year, $325 million playing contract for New York Yankees slugger Giancarlo Stanton.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and get this â€“ his promoter, Golden Boy, says it's structured for him to only fight *once a year*. That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and get this - his promoter, Golden Boy, says it's structured for him to only fight once a year. That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alvarez will kick off his DAZN deal December 15 at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding, and then likely fight again in early May for a Cinco de Mayo match.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Only once a year! I mean, that's what, uh, $33 million per fight? It's just insane money. And it's all with DAZN, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Only once a year! I mean, that's what, uh, thirty three million dollars per fight? It's just insane money. And it's all with D A Z N, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The deal is worth a minimum of $365 million, an average of $33 million per fight, according to his promoter Golden Boy Promotions. Alvarez will kick off his DAZN deal December 15 at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, DAZN. Kicks off December 15th against Rocky Fielding. I actually thought HBO was his, like, go-to.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, D A Z N. Kicks off December fifteenth against Rocky Fielding. I actually thought H B O was his, like, go-to.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alvarez will kick off his DAZN deal December 15 at Madison Square Garden against Rocky Fielding... HBO was the former home for Alvarez, who ranks as the biggest pay-per-view star in the sport after the retirement of Floyd Mayweather.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, HBO actually announced they're, uh, pretty much stepping away from boxing coverage. So DAZN is really making a move here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, H B O actually announced they're, uh, pretty much stepping away from boxing coverage. So D A Z N is really making a move here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But HBO announced last month that it would end its coverage of boxing at the end of 2018.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So it's a streaming service, then? Like, [interrupts] this is a huge play for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's a streaming service, then? Like, this is a huge play for them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They just launched in the US, I think last month. They also, um, signed a billion-dollar deal with Matchroom Boxing back in May.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They just launched in the U S, I think last month. They also, um, signed a billion-dollar deal with Matchroom Boxing back in May.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: DAZN, which debuted two years ago in Germany, Austria, Switzerland and Japan, launched in the U.S. last month and is making a major push in combat sports. It signed an eight-year, $1 billion deal in May with Eddie Hearns Matchroom Boxing, home of heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A billion?! Wow. So Canelo's looking at, what, like $120 million in the next year alone with these new fights, the GGG money...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A billion?! Wow. So Canelo's looking at, what, like one hundred twenty million dollars in the next year alone with these new fights, the G G G money...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With the two DAZN fights, plus roughly $50 million for his razor-thin win over Gennady Golovkin last month and several million dollars from endorsements, Alvarez should bank at least $120 million over the 12 months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, plus endorsements, he's just banking. He could easily be the world's highest-paid athlete next year, according to Forbes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, plus endorsements, he's just banking. He could easily be the world's highest-paid athlete next year, according to Forbes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Mexican boxer has a strong chance to rank as the worlds highest-paid athlete next year in Forbes annual look at the top stars in sports.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's crazy when you think about it. Like, even compared to guys like Messi or Neymar, those deals are big, but this is different.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's crazy when you think about it. Like, even compared to guys like Messi or Neymar, those deals are big, but this is different.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Messi's like $350 million, but over five years. Canelo's is longer, but for, uh, essentially less work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Messi's like three hundred fifty million dollars, but over five years. Canelo's is longer, but for, uh, essentially less work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global soccer icons Neymar and Lionel Messi both have deals worth roughly $350 million, with Neymars a five-year contract and Messis haul spread over four years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And then there's that May fight with Golovkin that they're talking about, which is, uh, kinda unexpected, no?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And then there's that May fight with Golovkin that they're talking about, which is, uh, kinda unexpected, no?

dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, after all the, you know, promotional stunts they called the last ones. This one would be the real deal, first fight with G G G.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, bottom line: Canelo's living large, and DAZN is, like, shaking up the boxing world.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, bottom line: Canelo's living large, and D A Z N is, like, shaking up the boxing world.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's a game-changer, for sure.
